attributes.action: Disclose all scientific evidence about the damage Mercury in vaccines does to the immune system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since 1930 when Thimerosal was used to kill bacteria in multi dose vaccines, the public have not been made aware of its 49.6% Mercury content. This is one of the most toxic poisons on earth yet we have hidden the truth about the damage it does to cells and organs and injected it into immune-system compromised babies and the elderly. It is neurotoxic and genotoxic - that means it affects our DNA. It can lead to death. The epidemic of auto immune disorders,including Autism,and evidence of sudden deaths following vaccines containing this preservative etc cannot be dismissed as coincidence. Coincidences occur very rarely and these conditions are now commonplace.  

It is still being used, for instance, in flu vaccines.

The public deserves to know the truth about this preservative and the wealth of biological research showing its toxicity, not just the Big Pharma/politically manipulated epidemiology.
